page.title: 17Reading Habits_Rufforth.
page.content: The people of {Rufforth village } completed a{questionnaire }about their reading habits.From {109 }replies we found out that {67 }people borrow books from the{public library,31 } people use the { mobile library }and{ {66}people borrow books from friends. 95 people buy books,{87 }buy magazines,{31 }buy comics and{67 {people buy a}publication connected with a hobby or career.{81 }people buy a national newspaper,{81 }buy a local evening paper.{77 }people buy a Sunday paper.In the{mobile library}there are {2000 }books and on each visit {100 } books are exchanged.A typed out ticket is given to every member of the mobile library.Books can be reserved.To reserve a book for adults it costs { {25p ,12p }for an Old Age Pensioner and a child.Tapes can be requested. {
